resources.string: You can order perishable products (which you need daily) and during checkout, can select that order for daily delivery. PepperTap will deliver the order to you at 6am every day
You can order non-perishable products (which you need once a week) and during checkout, can select that order for weekly delivery. PepperTap will deliver the order to you at 6am every Saturday.
3. How can I stop an order from getting delivered to me?
Go to order details page via sidebar and select the order you want to stop from being delivered further.
4. Can I pause the delivery of an order for a time period? If so, how?
Yes, you can. You’ll have to go to order details page via sidebar and select the order you want to pause from being delivered for the time being.
5. Can I resume a paused order? If so, how?
Yes, you can. You’ll have to go to the order details page via sidebar and select the order for which you want to resume the delivery.
